summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account, detailing the beginning and ending balances, deposits, withdrawals, and interest payments for the month of December 2017. It includes information about service charges and provides instructions for addressing errors in the account statement.
locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, 113 St, Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $49,155,364.74 as of December 1, 2017.
The account received an interest payment of $35,486.18 on December 31, 2017.
The ending balance of the account as of December 31, 2017, was $49,190,850.92.
There were no service charges or overdraft fees during the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors in account statements.
